thread.title: Perfect for a City Break! Review
thread.title_full: Perfect for a City Break! - Review of Phoenix Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Radu T
title: Perfect for a City Break! Review
text:
Review for single Room 103 - first floor, facing street.
The room was very clean with high speed internet and it was enough for one person. Decent continental breakfast but if you stay more than three days it can get a little boring eating the same thing every morning. You can find a lot of restaurants and supermarkets nearby and the hotel is very close to Bayswater and Queensway subway stations. Even though it is a very quiet neighborhood you can hear some cars passing by early in the morning, so if you need absolute quite you should ask for a room that is not facing the street.
Overall it was a nice stay and i will definitely book again.
Room Tip: Choose higher rooms and preferably not facing the street. See more room tips
